feed.title: Admission
feed.subtitle: The Newsroom is dedicated to sharing Bard College at Simon’s Rock news and early college thought leadership.

entry.title: Reflections from Admission: Early College Move-in Day
entry.summary:
By Alexandra Taylor, Assistant Director of Admission

On Saturday, August 17, Bard College at Simon’s Rock welcomed its 46th class of freshmen from around the country and the world. One hundred and forty seven strangers arrived at the early college with at least one thing in common: each one of them left high school early to start college when they felt ready. 

Read More...
